ygData.subject: Gator Leggings?
ygData.msgSnippet: I am trying to get some gator leggings on Erollisi Marr. I am willing to buy or trade but I have yet to meet anyone with a reasonable offer. What would be a
ygData.messageBody:
I am trying to get some gator leggings on Erollisi Marr.

I am willing to buy or trade but I have yet to meet anyone with a reasonable
offer.

What would be a good plat amount for them, and what would be a reasonable
trade for them?

I have heard they go for 600 plat. I also tried trading a plat armband and a
Black Pearl Choker, and the guy would even return my replys.

I do have a extra charred guardian shield, but I do not feel that it should
be a straight trade (leggings for shield).

Any help is (as always) greatly appreciated,

Jeff
Cadfael, 34 lv, EM
